returns.active: True if all exist and are active

params.data: Hash of the underlying matter or metadata

returns.elems: Element values at the given revision

returns.active: True if all values exist and are active

uniqueDescriptor(uint64,uint32).notice: Returns the descriptor at a given revision

uniqueOwner(uint64).notice: Returns the current owner of a unique

uniqueSnapshot(uint64,uint32).notice: Returns descriptor and elements at a specific revision

uniqueSota(uint64).notice: Returns the latest descriptor and current owner

uniqueStatus(uint64[]).notice: Checks whether all given uniques are active (revision > 0)

uniqueTouch(uint64).notice: Bumps the revision of a unique with no content change

uniqueTransfer(uint64,address).notice: Transfers ownership of a unique token

uniqueUpdate(uint64,bytes32).notice: Updates the data hash of a unique

uniqueUpdate(uint64,bytes32,string).notice: Updates the data hash and symbol of a unique

uniqueUpgrade(uint64,uint32,uint32).notice: Upgrades the kind and/or set revision of a unique

valueDescriptor(uint64,uint32).notice: Returns the descriptor of a value at a specific revision

valueOwner(uint64).notice: Returns the current owner of a value

valueRevision(uint64,uint32).notice: Resolves and validates a revision of a value

valueSnapshot(uint64,uint32).notice: Returns descriptor and elements of a value at a specific revision

valueSota(uint64).notice: Returns the latest descriptor and current owner of a value

valueStatus(uint64[]).notice: Checks whether all specified values are active (revision > 0)

valueTouch(uint64).notice: Touches a value, bumping its revision without changing its content

valueTransfer(uint64,address).notice: Transfers ownership of a value to a new address

valueUpdate(uint64,bytes32).notice: Updates the data hash of an existing value

valueUpdate(uint64,bytes32,string).notice: Updates the data hash and symbol of an existing value

valueUpgrade(uint64,uint32,uint32).notice: Upgrades the kind/set revision of a value
